name: Light in the dark
description: Immerse yourself in unique gameplay and atmosphere of the game Light in the shadow. You are waiting for an adventure in the mysterious maze, where your main character is a glowing sphere. You will move around the dark corners of the maze lighting the way in search of an exit, to reach the end you have to maintain inner glow using energy...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP \ 7 \ 8 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 101 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP \ 7 \ 8 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space
